channel.title: Closing keynote on Booster Conference 2023 Bergen
channel.description: Recent content in Closing keynote on Booster Conference 2023 Bergen

item.title: The nature of ~~code~~ storytelling.
item.description: In your day-to-day job the opportunity to stop and smell the roses hardly presents itself. Under pressure of producing solutions one rarely reflects and asks big questions like, what is it that we are doing, why do we create software the way we do and where did I leave my favorite mug. In this talk Daan will take you on a personal journey and try to uncover the essence of the nature of code.
